document.discussion_title: This crazy inventor has just built – and ridden – a huge 360-degree swing in his yard - Hot Techie News
document.topic_text: by Hot Techie News Team | Aug 12, 2016 | digitaltrends.com | 0 comments Briton Colin Furze has made a name for himself in recent years inventing crazy contraptions and putting them on YouTube. His latest work? A swing taller than his house that turns all the way around. With him on it. The post This crazy inventor has just built – and ridden – a huge 360-degree swing in his yard appeared first on Digital Trends. Follow Us Top Posts & Pages
